description: A set of big pointy legs, like the ones found under a tripod.
What's left when you remove all moving parts and electronics.  It's the skeleton and armor of the tripod.
What's left when you remove all moving parts and electronics.  It's the skeleton and armor of the pathfinder.
What's left when you remove all moving parts and electronics.  It's the skeleton and armor of the Regulator tank.
What's left when you remove all moving parts and electronics.  It's the skeleton and armor of the Seneschal.
What's left when you remove all moving parts and electronics.  It's the skeleton and armor of the Likvidator.
What's left when you remove all moving parts and electronics.  Looking at it fills you with uneasiness as the Famulus stares at you with empty eyes.
What's left when you remove all moving parts and electronics.  It's the skeleton and armor of the Udarnik.
What's left when you remove all moving parts and electronics.  It's the skeleton and armor of the Brandspojt.
What's left when you remove all moving parts and electronics.  It's the skeleton and armor of the Surgical Droid.
What's left when you remove all moving parts and electronics.  It's the skeleton and armor of the Aegis.
What's left when you remove all moving parts and electronics.  It's the skeleton and armor of the military robot.
What's left when you remove all moving parts and electronics.  You still feel deep down that its hollow eyes are studying you.
